description.value: You have absolute control and understanding of your attunement with the stellar forces of the cosmos. If you would become graviton- or photon-attuned, you instead become perfectly-attuned. When you're perfectly-attuned, you can choose which attunement bonus to benefit from (either graviton- or photon-attuned) when using any of your abilities. If any of your abilities require you to be in a specific attunement state, being perfectly-attuned counts as your choice of graviton- or photon-attuned.
